body.name: Beverly Hills Doll Collection Sweet Li’l Family Dollhouse Figures - Firefighter, Police Officer, Doctor and More, Set of 10 Action Figure People Doll House Set, Pretend Play for Kids and Toddlers

byLineInfo.name: Visit the Beverly Hills Doll Collection Store

deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 1 hr 22 mins
Or fastest pickup Sunday, February 18. Order within 1 hr 22 mins
features: Community Workers Figures Set: Includes a Fireman 6", Police officer 5.8", Pilot 5.8", Astronaut 5.8", chef 5.75", construction worker 5.8", mailman 5.8", doctor 5.8", Nurse 5.8", Soldier 5.8". Perfect for pretend play

Movable Joints! Figures are flexible. Move their arms & legs, and turn their heads from side to side. Flex them into sitting, bending, walking & kneeling positions. The community helpers people figurines feature a sturdy build enabling them to stand on their own. Imagination comes to life as kids bend and flex these plastic dollhouse people into different positions

I’ve Got A Role To Play! Each figure is dressed in the appropriate uniform and is equipped with the supplies they need for their unique occupation. The mailman’s got his mailbag, the doctor has his stethoscope, and the construction worker is loaded with tools. The figures all have one job in common – to provide hours of exciting pretend play entertainment!

Toddlers and children will love spending time with these community helpers. Children will enjoy hours of interactive and imaginative play while strengthening their finger dexterity and learning about the members of their community. Is it a soldier, a fireman or a chef? This set is the ideal play and learn toy. Figures come packaged in an attractive box. Makes the perfect gift for the child you love!

Looks So Real! The figures' detailed, lifelike features will enchant their play pals. This collection of play people is the perfect complement to your dollhouse accessories collection. The figures feel right at home in your dollhouse as dollhouse figures. They add excitement and adventure to dollhouse play. Play them with the blocks, on their own, or with any toy in the closet.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.8 4.8 out of 5 stars 496 ratings 4.8 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Detailed and realistic!!! Sturdy!
reviews.reviewText: What a great selection of real-world people for my toddler! We love these men and women at work, they’re sculpted with detail and all match each other in scale. Very sturdy dense plastic with articulated arms & legs, easy to pose and encouraged creative play. They add a lot of realistic fun to our existing vehicles and building sets!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Grandkids love these
reviews.reviewText: These are sturdy, practical, and they do a good job of diversity in the characters that they have created. My grandkids love them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love. Love. LOVE
reviews.reviewText: These are amazing! We only got them yesterday, but they seem super sturdy and well made. My toddler loves them! Wish more than the soldier was a darker skintone, but at least one is. Its great that that half of them are women. My husband says no one in U.S wears military fatigues in that style anymore. He appreciated that the left arm band American flag on astronaut is in “right direction,” he isn’t sure right wrist one is in correct direction though because it’d be backwards if shaking someone’s hand. Do people shake hands in space? We seriously love these. Such great craftsmanship and attention to detail! Really wish for more diversity though. Only 10% POC?! C’monn

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome Action Figures
reviews.reviewText: I agree with the other reviewers that some racial diversity is needed, but I like that there are men and women in different roles. These are great dolls/action figures and my son loves them. They are sturdy, the attention to detail is excellent, and they are of a good value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2022
reviews.reviewText: There is absolutely nothing that I dislike about this product, it is very sturdy and the children enjoy it very much at my daycare. You can move the arms and legs all different types of ways, and it is really great quality for the price, I highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great quality need some diversity
reviews.reviewText: Bendable, bright, good assortment of characters but would like to see some people of color included.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Son loves them.
reviews.reviewText: Son loves them. He has such an imagination. Good size and seem durable! They were tough to get but glad we waited!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2022
reviews.reviewText: They are of high quality and sturdy. Really like how they are portrayed. I am sure my grandson will like them too.
